attributes.action: replace the 2012 Olympics logo with a logo that represents what the London Olympics truly represents and one that Britains can be proud of.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many of us who think the "official" 2012 logo is ridiculous for the £400,000 spent. There any many alternatives created by the general public and it would be a good idea to get the country, as a whole, involved in the design of the logo. We ask that the offical logo be rejected and replaced with one the majority of the country would be proud of.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
